description: The IDF has pushed further into the Gaza Strip encircling Gaza City effectively cutting the enclave in half. Video published by Israel shows tanks destroying Hamas targets inside Gaza.
maintext:
Israeli soldiers have captured a Hamas stronghold while striking 450 targets in the last day, according to the Israel Defense Forces.
According to the IDF, the compound used by Hamas contained training grounds, observation posts and entrances to its vast tunnel network.
Israel claims to have killed numerous Hamas militants as it took over the site in Gaza. Video released by the IDF shows soldiers moving into Gaza while Israeli armour fires at targets in the strip.
The IDF also said it struck more than 450 Hamas targets in Gaza over the past day including anti-tank missile positions, observation posts, tunnels and military compounds.
One of those strikes took out top Hamas commander Jamal Musa the head of the organization's special operations forces, the IDF said.
title: Moment Israeli troops storm Hamas base as hundreds of terrorists targets blown sky high
